approval_data.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks

requirements.title: Create Task
requirements.description: The system shall allow a user to create a new task by providing a text description.

requirements.title: View Task List
requirements.description: The system shall display a list of all tasks created by the user.

requirements.title: Application Load Time
requirements.description: The application shall load within 3 seconds on a standard internet connection (e.g., 10 Mbps download speed) and a modern device (e.g., a recent smartphone or laptop).

requirements.title: User Authentication (Implicit)
requirements.description: The system shall protect user data from unauthorized access. (This is an implicit requirement derived from 'The application must be secure'.)

requirements.title: Data Integrity (Implicit)
requirements.description: The system shall ensure the integrity of the task data. (This is an implicit requirement derived from 'The application must be secure'.)

raw_analysis.project_summary: This project is a simple web application to manage a list of tasks
